flavor_text_entries.black:
When it overflows with power,
the orange crystal on its body glows.
It looks for underground water in caves.
flavor_text_entries.white:
Because its energy was too great to be
contained, the energy leaked and formed
orange crystals.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
When it is healthy, its core sticks out.
Always facing the same way, it swiftly
moves front to back and left to right.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
When it is healthy, its core sticks out.
Always facing the same way, it swiftly
moves front to back and left to right.
flavor_text_entries.x:
Because its energy was too great to be contained,
the energy leaked and formed orange crystals.
flavor_text_entries.y:
When it is healthy, its core sticks out. Always facing
the same way, it swiftly moves front to back and left
to right.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Because its energy was too great to be contained,
the energy leaked and formed orange crystals.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
When it is healthy, its core sticks out. Always facing
the same way, it swiftly moves front to back and left
to right.
flavor_text_entries.sun:
Its orange crystal is a mass of energy.
Just one crystal fragment would provide
enough fuel for a hundred dump trucks.
flavor_text_entries.moon:
It explores caves in search of underground
water. It’s not comfortable around water, so
this Pokémon takes great care in lapping it up.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
The energy overflowing from its body has
turned into orange crystals that are hard
enough to smash diamonds.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
Its orange crystals are lumps of powerful
energy. They’re valuable, so Boldore is
sometimes targeted for them.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
If you see its orange crystals start to glow, be
wary. It’s about to fire off bursts of energy.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
It relies on sound in order to monitor what’s in its
vicinity. When angered, it will attack without ever
changing the direction it’s facing.
